Tasks¶

Module for celery tasks.

tasks.update_flickr_user(min_fave_date=0, flickruser=None)¶

Update Flickr user like and him Weight relationships. Use FlickrAPI.

tasks.update_photo()¶

Update photo favorited. Use FlickrAPI.
